description: Meatballs make the perfect quick and easy filling for vegan tacos with all the trimmings.
name: Plant Based Meatball Tacos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, peeled and chopped
2 large capsicums, red and green, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the meatballs, stirring often, for 5 minutes until browned all over. Add the onions and capsicums and cook for 6-7 minutes.
Stir in the garlic, cumin and chipotle paste and cook for 1 minute. Heat the tortillas according to pack instructions.
Serve with sliced avocado, vegan cheese, chopped coriander and lime wedges on the side.
